lore: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans alike to survive the harsh winters. Sejuani herself spearheads the most dangerous of these attacks from the saddle of her dr√ºvask boar Bristle, using her True Ice flail to freeze and shatter her enemies.
title: Fury of the North
blurb: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans...
allytips: Use Arctic Assault to escape bad situations, interupt channeled spells or chase runners.
Melee allies can stack Frost for your Permafrost, keep an eye on who they are attacking.
Save Glacial Prison for encounters where you have teammates present to take advantage of it.

passive.name: Fury of the North
passive.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>
passive.sanitizedDescription: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

enemytips: Dodging Arctic Assault and Glacial Prison can give you a huge advantage.
Focus on avoiding the second swing of Winter's Wrath which carries the brunt of the damage.
Melee enemies can also stack Frost for Sejuani, be very careful around them.
name: Sejuani

spells.name: Arctic Assault
spells.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

spells.name: Winter's Wrath
spells.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back. She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

spells.name: Permafrost
spells.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced.

An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters. Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced. An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Prison
spells.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second. The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.
